introDescription: Ads help us run this site. When you use this site, selected companies may access and use information about your device to serve relevant ads. Learn more and manage your choices. You can update your choices at any time.
saveAndExitDescription: Are you sure you want to save and exit?
acceptAllDescription: By accepting all, you will enable all purposes we and third-parties require.
denyAllDescription: Be aware that by clicking “deny” not all features of this app may operate properly.
purposesTabDescription: We, and selected companies, may access and use information for the purposes below. You may customise your choice or continue using our service if you are okay with the purposes listed.
vendorsTabDescription: These are the partners we share data with. By clicking into each partner, you can see which purposes they are requesting consent and/or which purposes they are claiming legitimate interest for. You can turn each one on and off to control whether or not data is shared with them or simply disable all data processing. However, please note that by disabling all data processing, some site functionality may be affected.
iabExplanation: Consent is stored and processed in compliance with the IAB Transparancy and COnsent Framework policy.
objectToLegitimateInterestDescription: Object to this vendor processing data on the legal ground of legitimate interest.
privacyInformationDescription: Use this page to learn more about data privacy and how data is used to improve your site experience.
auditIdExplanation: Audit Id is a random unique number that is generated for you when you visit this website. The purpose of the Audit ID is to keep a record of your consent history on which cookies you accepted and when. The information kept in relation to your Audit ID includes, timestamp, version of cookie vendor list and a list of vendors that are allowed to process your data.
resetAuditIdDialogBody: Resetting your Audit ID will make it impossible for the website owner to verify your consent history prior to the reset.
legitimateInterestNote: For some purposes, your personal data may be processed on the legal ground of legitimate interest
purposesDetailsDescription: We, and selected companies, may access and use information for the purpose below. You may customise your choice or continue using our service if you are okay with the purpose listed.
vendorsDetailsDescription: These are the partners we share data with. By clicking into each partner, you can see which purposes they are requesting consent and/or which purposes they are claiming legitimate interest for. You can turn each one on and off to control whether or not data is shared with them or simply disable all data processing. However, please note that by disabling all data processing, some site functionality may be affected.
